help.infoDetailedDesc:
Displays all available commands sorted by category.
Use </help:1030389826148630579> `(command name)` to see details, permissions and other information.

changelog.title: Latest changelogs:
changelog.infoDetailedDesc:
Displays the last 10 changes that were made to the bot.
</changelog:1030215267961282570> `(version)` will let you see the details of the changes

bot.title: Informations about Simply
bot.infoDeetailedDesc: Displays detailed bot information such as statistics, host, versions, etc.

settings.verifyFooter: Use /verify edit to change message location, text or add roles.
settings.noVerify:
This server doesn't have a configured verification system!
Use /verify create if you want one.
settings.infoDetailedDesc:
This command is a summary of all server settings.
Lists the permissions and system verification settings.
You can also change the bot language with this command.

perms.powerValue: Permissions power value should be **an integer**, **greater than 0** and **less than 100**.
perms.title: Permissions power has been changed!
perms.footer: Enter /settings permissions to see all permissions.
perms.infoDetailedDesc:
This command allows you to set the permissions power per command, role or user.
Each configuration is server-based!
The minimum value of the permission power is **0** and the maximum is **100**
Users with the administrator permissions have a predetermined permissions power of 100, so you must have an administrator to configure commands for other users.
Higher power = higher priority, i.e. a user with a power of 5 will not be able to use a command with a power of 10.
At the resultant power the greatest value is taken, i.e. a user with power 15 and role with power 10 will have a power of 15.

verify.noText: The verification channel must be a **text channel**!
verify.noPerms: I don't have permissions to send messages on this channel! (`SEND MESSAGES`)
verify.noHigher: The verification role can't be higher than my role!
verify.noBotRole: The verification role can't be a bot role!
verify.title: Verification for
verify.desc:
To have access to the rest of the server you need to verify yourself!
When you are ready, click the **Start!** button.
verify.noVerify:
This server doesn't have a configured verification system!
Use /verify create if you want one.
verify.editSelectEmbedDesc: Select if you want to edit the title, description and button of an embed.
verify.editSelectChannelDesc: Select if you want to edit the verification channel.
verify.editSelectRolesDesc: Select if you want to add verification roles.
verify.removeDesc:
This will completely remove the verification system on this server.
Are you sure you want to do this?
verify.infoDetailedDesc:
This command allows you to create a verification system based on performing a math operation, assigns role(s) after successful verification.
You can also edit the already created verification system (text, channel, roles) or completely remove it.

timeout.permPower: The user you want to timeout must not have a permissions power greater than or equal to you!
timeout.wrongTime:
Wrong time entered! Follow the pattern:

5d 20h
20m
14d 5m
timeout.error: An unidentified error has occurred, please try again.
timeout.infoDetailedDesc:
This command allows you to prevent users from typing in a chat and talking on voice channels.
Each such timeout is saved to the "user punishments" available under the /punishments command.

punishments.noPunishments: There are no punishments for this user!
punishments.infoDetailedDesc: Displays all previous user punishments divided by categories (All, Timeout).

error.permPowerTitle: Sorry, but your permission power is too low to use this command!
error.initError: There was an error, please contact the developer with the error ID:

langChange: Successfully changed language to English! ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§

verify.editRolesModalLabelRoles: Just roles ID separated by semicolon (;)
verify.alreadyVerify: This channel is already a verification channel!
verify.successChanged: The verification channel has been successfully changed!
verify.remove: The verification system has been successfully removed!
verify.alreadyAdded: This role is already added to the verification system!
verify.roleAdded: has been added to verification system!

text: Fix and update for help command.
Fix checking permission power when executing a command.
Checking the permission power when executing the command.
Location based command names and descriptions added (changelog, help, ping).
Added commands and roles data to the server database schema.
Added member data to the server database schema.
Creation of mongoDB events (connected, connecting, disconeccted, err).
Creation of a timeout command that allows preventing users from writing and talking (incomplete).
Creation of a punishments command that allows you to see all users punishments by category (incomplete).
Update for verify command, now you can add roles for your verification system.
A small fix for the settings command.
A fix for the settings command.
Fixed the possibility of creating a verification system when one already exists.
Fixed the server icon not showing up when editing the embed text in the verification system.
Update for verify command, now you can edit channel for your verification system.
A Fix for the verify command.
Update for verify command, now you can edit your (already configured) verification system.
Minor update for verification system creating function.
A fix for the verification submit.
New verification system (incomplete) based on performing a math operation (/verify create).
Update for settings command, possibility to see new verification system settings.
Update for settings command, possibility to change the language with the /settings language.
Creation of perms command that allows to edit the permissions power for commands, roles and users.
A fix for the bot command.
Creation of a settings command that displays specific server settings.
Minor update for a help command.
Creation of a function of checking the permission power for each command.
Creation of a bot command containing information about the bot.
Minor update for the changelog command.
A small fix for the help command.
Minor update for the help command.
The function of creating server configuration files when added to server.
Adding the option to change the language (Polish and English).
Idea to rewrite Simply, amateurly written bot from 2019.
Creation of initialization and configuration files.
First bot functions like status and command handler.
